executable.title: Osteotomy Model To Model Distance
executable.description: This module computes distance point by point between 2 meshes
executable.acknowledgements: This work was funded by National Institute of Dental and Craniofacial Research (NIDCR) and the National Institute of Biomedical Imaging and Bioengineering (NIBIB) through the Grant R01 DE024450

geometry.name: vtkOutput
geometry.label: VTK Output File
geometry.description: Output Model (*.vtk or *.vtp). The output model will have the content of this file (points and fields) as well as the newly computed distance information. The distance is computed at every point of the source model to the target model.

string-enumeration.name: distanceType
string-enumeration.description: Choose the metric used to compute the distance between the 2 given meshes
string-enumeration.label: Distance

boolean.name: targetInFields
boolean.label: Save target name in distance fields
boolean.description: Saves the target model name as part of the distance fields saved in the output file. This allows a user to know against which target shape the distances have been computed.
